#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, n;

    cin >> t;

    while(t--) {
        cin >> n;
        long long int r = n;
       long long int sum = 0;
       while(n != 0) {
        sum += n%10;
        n /= 10;
       }
      // cout << sum << endl;
       cout << (r*((1<<sum))) << endl;
    }
}
